ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Crowd Control
ygData.msgSnippet: I m still having fun playing Tani - not disillusioned at all yet.  However, whenever I mention how much fun playing my bard is, all the 55+ bards in my guild
ygData.messageBody:
I'm still having fun playing Tani - not disillusioned at all yet. However,
whenever I mention how much fun playing my bard is, all the 55+ bards in my
guild just about roll over laughing and say "just wait"... like I've said
before, I think Verant sees Bards as their "crowning achievement" and just
can't see why we're complaining. Either that, or the person they originally
had design the Bard has left and nobody knows how he coded it or such :)

Halana, 56th Shaman aka Raptor Fodder
Tani, 28th Bard of SPLAT (was running along in Overthere in the fog....
there's a big chasm there :))
Paradigm
Solusek Ro


>
> i don't think crowd control or dealing without lullaby is the
> issue for
> most. we have all dealt without lullaby for a year. it's
> the way bards are
> being treated by verant. as i think kitasi said, i would never have
> expected to see lyrnia go as she was an avid supporter of
> verant decisions
> (nothing wrong with that, just saying). the way they make
> decisions about
> bards is what i think people can no longer stomach.
>
> Shada
>
> > Since I have given up ever getting mez again, I have moved on with
> > (Dark)Elfson Allegro. My guild has fallen in love with City
> > of Mist this
> > week (after past affairs with Dalinars and Kaesora).
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
